triples.name: Object Constraint Language
triples.relevance: OCL is the source language being mapped to first-order logic for constraint checking.

triples.name: First-order logic
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel mapping from OCL to first-order logic as its main contribution.

triples.name: Automated theorem proving
triples.relevance: Automated theorem provers are used as reasoning tools to check unsatisfiability of OCL constraints.

triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: SMT solvers are employed to automatically verify the unsatisfiability of constraint sets.
